text.headline: Timeline of the Mahabharata
text.text: A journey through the epic story of the Mahabharata — from the birth of Krishna to the dawn of Kali Yuga.

text.headline: Birth of Krishna
text.text: Krishna, the incarnation of Vishnu, is born in Mathura to Devaki and Vasudeva.

text.headline: Pandavas and Kauravas Are Born
text.text: The two royal families of Hastinapura are born cousins destined for war.

media.caption: Family tree of the Kuru dynasty

text.headline: Draupadi's Swayamvar
text.text: Arjun participates and wins in draupadi's swayamvar.

text.headline: Draupadi's Vastraharan
text.text: Duryodhan plots a game of dice and takes everything away from the pandavas.

media.caption: The game of Dice also known as dyuta sabha

text.headline: The Battle of Kurukshetra
text.text: The great war between the Pandavas and Kauravas begins, lasting 18 days and changing history forever.

media.caption: Artistic depiction of the Kurukshetra war

text.headline: Krishna Leaves the Mortal World
text.text: Krishna departs, marking the beginning of the Kali Yuga — the age of darkness.
